review: Great product. Love having access to prime on my tv. Makes it unnecessary for us to have cable
author: Lee Isaac

review: great for listening to music and watching tv with
author: Kim Cramer

review: Yes it works great but I really wish they would separate the free movies from the NOT FREE movies! Even on prime they are all mixed up. And frankly I'm shocked that I would have to pay to watch a movie that's 5 or more years old. That's on Prime and Netflix. I find that to be a major rip off.
author: Mustang

review: Plug and play, that simple. Bought one for all my tv's
author: Amazon Customer

review: Easy to set up, beautiful interface.
author: Hassan Yates

review: If you don't have a smartTv the stick is awesome
author: philippe avila

review: Streaming is awful. Other products work well with out Internet. I was really looking forward to using it.
author: Xiomara

review: love the fire stick, it has really made smart tv, smart... great interface and very fast access to whatever you choose, apps and videos load much faster with the fire stick as opposed to the software that comes built into "smart" sets.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I LOVE IT !!! ITS LITETALLY THE BEST THING EVER.
